title: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work.
description:
Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work.

Description: Color orange doesn't work.
OB: When setting the color or background color to orange in a report item, the color is not applied.
EB: The color or background color should be applied correctly when set to orange.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.
3. Observe that the color is not applied correctly.
